item.title: Installation
item.description: The fastest way to get started with Aspect is to use the Docker image from Docker Hub: docker pull im5tu/aspect Once pulled, you can run the docker image like so: docker run -it --rm im5tu/aspect This will start a new command line with the aspect command available so you can then run one of the available commands straight away. Depending which cloud resource you intend to use, you may also need to mount credential folders.

item.title: Builtin Functions
item.description: When building your policies, you may which to perform certain operations like seeing whether or not a string contains a specific value. Aspect provides you with a set of built in functions to help you. All of the functions follow this format: functionName(input.<property>, <arg1> [, arg2..]) The first argument to each function must be an accessor to a property on the input. This is followed by the function arguments specified in one of the functions below.
